content: With the Pinebrew Drink equipped, each sip of your Gourd will recover 35% of maximum health. Additionally, when your health is below half, using the gourd will grant you a considerable amount of Focus, key to performing some of the more powerful heavy attacks in the game with your weapon or as one of the Transformation Spells.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pinebrew.md', within the main section titled 'Pinebrew'.
The content is as follows:
With the Pinebrew Drink equipped, each sip of your Gourd will recover 35% of maximum health. Additionally, when your health is below half, using the gourd will grant you a considerable amount of Focus, key to performing some of the more powerful heavy attacks in the game with your weapon or as one of the Transformation Spells.
